author: Arthur Tarling
description: This gin and cognac orange-based citrusy cocktail is deliberately, and indeed originally, formulated to be a tad on the sour side, but is balanced by a luxuriant sugar-crusted rim.
name: Red Lion (Tarling's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
